ssot__Voucher__dlm.name: Voucher
ssot__Voucher__dlm.description: The Voucher DMO represents a document that authorizes the disbursement of cash or credit for a purchase or expense.

ssot__AccountID__c.description: A reference ID to the account where this voucher is associated with.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DiscountPercent__c.description: The reduction in price that the voucher holder is entitled to use, typically a fraction of the original price.

ssot__EffectiveDate__c.description: The date when voucher goes into effect.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FaceValueAmount__c.description: The value amount of a voucher.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitId__c.description: A reference ID to perk or betterment available to loyalty program members. Examples include waived airline baggage fees, complimentary hotel stays, or rental car upgrades.

ssot__LoyaltyJournalSubtypeId__c.description: A reference ID to subtype of the loyalty journal type entry, for example, a watched video or a product review.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to person who joined loyalty program.

ssot__LoyaltyTransactionJournalId__c.description: A reference ID to all transactions related to loyalty program.

ssot__Notestext__c.description: The reason why voucher was issued.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.

ssot__PaymentMethodStatus__c.description: The status of the payment method related to the voucher.

ssot__PaymentMethodTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of voucher payment method.

ssot__PromotionId__c.description: A reference ID to campaign that provides discounts or other reasons for adjusting an order.

ssot__UsedDate__c.description: The date when the voucher was used.

ssot__VoucherDefinitionId__c.description: A reference ID to main voucher from which instance vouchers awarded to individual people are derived.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Voucher DMO.

ssot__VoucherStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of voucher, for example, issued or expired.

ssot__VoucherTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of voucher, for example, accrual or manual action.
